transArray.content: Business trip, cleanliness is good, breakfast is okay, but when I checked in, I heard the sound of traffic on the road and asked to change a room, but when I changed to the opposite side, it was the same, and there was a smell of cigarettes. The hotel is not soundproof. After the deluxe room type was determined, it was found that it was only a different floor from the superior room. Other facilities and services are not bad.
